Text: Sean Christie:  Previously, Christie served as the Chief Operating Officer as well as the Vice President of Operations at Wynn and Encore and before that he served as the founder and owner of Las Vegas Nightlife Group and managing partner of Encore Las Vegas Beach Club, Surrender Night Club, and Andrea’s Restaurant at the Wynn Las Vegas.
